nodes.text: Jagger was a Mandalorian and a member of Clan Ordo who lived during the tumultuous period of conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire known as the Cold War, Jagger joined Corridan Ordo and several members of their clan, along with close friend Torian Cadera, on a hunting trip to Dxun, Onderon's beast-infested moon. The Mandalorians hunted mostly bomas and maalraas, but Jagger managed to take down a zakkeg during the course of the trip. Because of this, Cadera later light-heartedly referred to Jagger as a "lucky jare"—a Mandalorian term for an almost suicidally reckless individual.
Jagger was first introduced to Star Wars canon in the massively multiplayer online game, Star Wars: The Old Republic, created by BioWare and released December 20, 2011.
